Reimu.name: Reimu Hakurei
Reimu.title: Shrine Maiden of Paradise
Reimu.description: A slow but balanced character with a weaker homing attack and spellcard

Marisa.name: Marisa Kirisame
Marisa.title: Magician of the Ordinary
Marisa.description: A low ranged character with a high speed and powerful attack to compensate

Murasa.name: Minamitsu Murasa
Murasa.title: Ghost Left From the Shipwreck Accident
Murasa.description: A medium character with pretty balanced stats

Nue.name: Nue Houjuu
Nue.title: Unidentified Fantastic Flying Alien
Nue.description: A character with a powerful melee, if you dare to get up personal that is. Agile to compensate
